page.title: 18Growth of Trimley
page.content: Part of a big new housing estate is in our block. Over the past ten years hundreds of houses have been built on what used to be farmland. This building has had a big effect on the village. The Primary school,just outside our block, has grown from about 240 to about 400 in five years.It is now being extended.New shops have been opened and a bus service runs through the estate. No new playing fields have been made and there is the need for a proper village hall. Some people think the village is better now it is bigger. Others say that it has changed so much that it doesn't seem like a village any more. The estates are nearly finished now and there is not much room for more building between the High Road and the by-pass, so perhaps Trimley will not grow much more.
